__e: Riley, this is Henry, this is Jack, this is Albert.
I'm sorry Riley, but I think it's best if you keep your next appointment.
Now, Mrs Riley, and only Mrs Riley, how many fingers am I holding up now?
I was taught to hate humans, the Federation-- but Riley and I are friends now. I'm part of the cooperative.
With the exception of Riley and Captain Kirk, every other eyewitness is dead.
Riley has received two sentences to my knowledge for the receipt of stolen goods.
But I've only got two tickets and Riley's got her heart set on it.
Ms. Riley has the gift of speech.
Dr Riley's been in emergency surgery for 4 hours.
Riley, I'm sorry. I must insist you answer no more questions, at least until we've had a chance to confer.
Well, miss Riley Doesn't know me.
Riley, I warned you not to say anything.
